definition_en: The U.S. federal agency that regulates commercial nuclear power plants and other uses of nuclear materials, such as in nuclear medicine, through licensing, inspection, and enforcement of its requirements.
definition_ko: 원자력 발전소 및 기타 핵물질 사용(핵의학 등)을 인허가, 검사 및 규정 집행을 통해 관리하는 미국의 연방 기관.

slots.context_ko: A single copy of each NRC draft report is available free, to the extent of supply, upon written request as follows:
